item.description:
In a tightly contested evening on the 6th, we wrapped up another first place prize, leaping to first place during the final round (it was a nail biter). Come help us spend it, meet new people, show off what you know and have a good time! Competition is getting fiercer and more teams are competing, we can always use new brains to cover strange TV, Movie, Science, History, Geography and all sorts of other questions.

The trivia starts at 8 and runs until 10.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guy with the Rhode Island Curiousities Book and a Meetup sign on the table.
item.name: Trouncing Other Trivia Teams @ Snookers
